component.name: AtmosphericChemistry
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmosphericChemistry required

component.name: AtmChemKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemKeyProperties required

parameter.name: ChemSchemeScope
parameter.definition: Which atmospheric domains are covered by the atmospheric chemistry model?

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Decribe the basic approximations made in the Atmospheric Chemistry model.

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: What prognostic variables are used by the atmospheric chemistry model?

parameter.name: NumberOfTracers
parameter.definition: Enter the number of tracers in the atmospheric chemistry model.

parameter.name: FamilyApproach
parameter.definition: Are atmospheric chemistry calculations generalised into families of species?

component.name: AtmChemSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: GridConfig
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfig required

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the horizontal grid used for atmospheric chemistry and aerosols.

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the atmospheric chemistry and aerosols model.

parameter.name: GridConfiguration
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfiguration required

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the vertical grid used for atmospheric chemistry and aerosols.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of vertical levels in atmospheric chemistry and aerosols model.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Definition of property name NumberOfLevels required

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinateSystem
parameter.definition: Definition of property name VerticalCoordinateSystem required

constraint.name: if VerticalCoordinateSystem is not "hybrid sigma pressure"

parameter.name: LevelsValues
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LevelsValues required

parameter.name: LevelsA-Values
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LevelsA-Values required

parameter.name: LevelsB-Values
parameter.definition: Definition of property name LevelsB-Values required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Mathematical method deployed to solve the evolution of a given variable. If "operator splitting" all the processes are decoupled, the time evolution is calculated sequentially and the tendencies "cumulated". If "integrated" all the processes having an impact on the time evolution are taken into account and solved simultaneously.

parameter.name: AdvectionTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for chemical species advection.

parameter.name: PhysicalTimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for physics and chemistry.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step for the chemistry model

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Specify the type of time step scheme.

component.name: AtmChemTransport
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemTransport required

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: The type of atmospheric chemistry transport scheme.

parameter.name: MassConservation
parameter.definition: How is mass conservation maintained? i) "mass adjustment": Adjustment is required to conserve mass. ii) "concentration positivity": Negative concentrations are reset. iii) "gradient monotony": Sharp gradients in concentration are smoothed.

parameter.name: Convection
parameter.definition: Convective Transport: i) "convective fluxes connected to tracers": Do tracers "see" convection? ii) "vertical velocities connected to tracers": Are the mass flux vertical velocities connected with tracers in the atmos chemistry scheme?

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Is chemistry transport scheme turbulence in 2D or 3D?

parameter.name: CouplingWithChemicalReactivity
parameter.definition: Is chemistry transport scheme turbulence coupled with chemical reactivity?

component.name: AtmChemEmissionAndConc
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChemEmissionAndConc required

component.name: AtmChem2D-Sources
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChem2D-Sources required

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of gaseous species emitted by the vegetation.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by vegetation.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of gaseous species emitted by bare ground.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by bare ground.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: list of gaseaous species emitted by sea surface.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by sea surface.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by human activities at the surface.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by ground based human activities.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

component.name: AtmChem3D-Sources
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmChem3D-Sources required

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by aircrafts.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by bare aircraft.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: list of 3D species emitted by biomass burning.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by biomass burning.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of species emitted by lightnings.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by lightning.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: SpeciesEmitted
parameter.definition: List of 3D species emitted by volcanoes.

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Method used to define gaseous species emitted by volcanoes.

parameter.name: ClimatologyType
parameter.definition: Specify the climatology type.

parameter.name: PrescribedLowerBoundary
parameter.definition: List of species prescribed at the lower boundary.

parameter.name: PrescribedUpperBoundary
parameter.definition: List of species prescribed at the upper boundary.

component.name: AtmGasPhaseChemistry
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmGasPhaseChemistry required

parameter.name: Species
parameter.definition: Species included in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: DryDeposition
parameter.definition: Is dry deposition prescribed or interactive? Dry deposition describes the dry processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

parameter.name: WetDeposition
parameter.definition: Is wet deposition included? Wet deposition describes the moist processes by which gaseous species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

parameter.name: Oxidation
parameter.definition: Is oxidation included? Oxidation describes the loss of electrons or an increase in oxidation state by a molecule.

parameter.name: WashOut-RainOut
parameter.definition: Downward transport of soluble chemistry species in clouds.

parameter.name: NumberOfBimolecularReactions
parameter.definition: The number of bi-molecular reactions in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfTermolecularReactions
parameter.definition: The number of ter-molecular reactions in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfAdvectedSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of advected species in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfSteadyStateSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of steady state species in the gas phase chemistry scheme.

component.name: AtmHeterogeneousChemistry
component.definition: Definition of component type AtmHeterogeneousChemistry required

component.name: StratosphericHeterChem
component.definition: Definition of component type StratosphericHeterChem required

parameter.name: GasPhase
parameter.definition: Gas phase species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: Aerosol-PSC
parameter.definition: Aerosol species included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: Sedimentation
parameter.definition: Is sedimentation included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme? Sedimentation is the vertical settling of particles.

parameter.name: Coagulation
parameter.definition: Is coagulation included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme? Coagulation is a process by which aerosol particles grow.

parameter.name: NumberOfReactions
parameter.definition: The number of reactions in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfAdvectedSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of advected species in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfSteadyStateSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of steady state species in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

component.name: TroposphericHeterChem
component.definition: Definition of component type TroposphericHeterChem required

parameter.name: GasPhase
parameter.definition: List of gas phase species involved in tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry processes.

parameter.name: Aerosols
parameter.definition: Aerosol species included in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: DryDeposition
parameter.definition: Is dry deposition prescribed or interactive? Dry deposition describes the dry processes by which species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

parameter.name: WetDeposition
parameter.definition: Is wet deposition included? Wet deposition describes the moist processes by which species deposit themselves on solid surfaces thus decreasing their concentration in the air.

parameter.name: WashOut-RainOut
parameter.definition: Downward transport of soluble chemistry species in clouds.

parameter.name: coagulation
parameter.definition: Is coagulation included in the stratospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme? Coagulation is a process by which aerosol particles grow.

parameter.name: NumberOfReactions
parameter.definition: The number of reactions in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfAdvectedSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of advected species in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.
Enter the number of advected species in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfSteadyStateSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of steady state species in the tropospheric heterogeneous chemistry scheme.

component.name: PhotoChemistry
component.definition: Definition of component type PhotoChemistry required

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Is the photolysis scheme online or offline? If it is offline, does the look up table take clouds into account with respect to effective photolysis rate for photodissociation?

parameter.name: Processes
parameter.definition: Processes included in the photolysis scheme.

parameter.name: ReactionData
parameter.definition: Reaction information taken into account by the photolysis scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfReactions
parameter.definition: The number of reactions in the photo-chemistry scheme.

parameter.name: NumberOfSpecies
parameter.definition: The number of species in the photo-chemistry scheme.
